3. Text: In mathematics — specifically, in stochastic analysis — Dynkin's formula is a theorem giving the expected value of any suitably smooth statistic of an Itō diffusion at a stopping time.
Triplets:<Dynkin's formula

--------------------
Text: Dynkin's formula:  It may be seen as a stochastic generalization of the (second) fundamental theorem of calculus.
